entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
